scripts.start: cd ../src/MarauderMap.HttpApi.Host && dotnet publish -c Release -o ../../electron/host/MarauderMap.HttpApi.Host && cd ../MarauderMap.Blazor.Host && dotnet publish -c Release -o ../../electron/host/MarauderMap.Blazor.Host && cd ../../electron && electron .
scripts.dev: cd ../src/MarauderMap.HttpApi.Host && dotnet publish -c Debug -o ../../electron/host/MarauderMap.HttpApi.Host && cd ../MarauderMap.Blazor.Host && dotnet publish -c Debug -o ../../electron/host/MarauderMap.Blazor.Host && cd ../../electron && electron . --inspect
